ok why does nobody ever seed this torrent? I'm uploading at 900 kbps and downloading at 2 kbps....
Thanks burgundy.  thanks for subtitle file.  but the torrent don't download yet.. no seeds???

can you please upload the (SD) version
thank you
my vlc media player doesn't recognise the subtitles file, whats wrong?

I'm in the process of downloading the SD. Facts are that the HD version gets 5 or 6 times the number of downloads. So, I prioritize that one.

In terms of seeding, when I post the torrent, I seed for as long as it takes for others to get a full version and I see more seeders. For a reason I can't explain, TPB does NOT see me as the original seeder and will show a 0 as number of seeders. DO NOT GO BY THIS.

Thanks

wasn't going by that, I am going by the fact that I end up uploading at 1 mpbs while downloading at 1.5 kpbs so by the time I get the file I have uploaded 10-20 gigs of data. Shouldn't be like that unless the seeders aren't seeding properly.
